title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 445.2 - Aid in distress
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 445.2 - Aid in distress

State Regulations

It shall be the duty of every master or pilot of any
vessel to render such assistance as he or she can possibly give to any other
vessel coming under his or her observation and being in distress on account of
accident, collision or otherwise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
445.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
